snippet: Speaking from the White House on Tuesday, President Obama said he would not give in to unreasonable demands by “one faction, of one party, of one house of Congress in one branch of government.”
abstract: Speaking from the White House on Tuesday, President Obama said he would not give in to unreasonable demands by “one faction, of one party, of one house of Congress in one branch of government.”

headline.main: Obama Urges Republicans to Drop Health Law Fight
